_sText:
V2:
This is the new and updated version of my map, deathrun_ennui. It looks significantly different, there are some modifications in the traps, and there are new finishing areas.

Lighting Changes:
HDR lighting
Volumetric lighting
Less blotchy spots

Geometry Changes:
Cleaner look
No more leaks (yeh deathrun_ennui had leaks in it, poor mapping right there)
Windows
Open finishing areas

Trap Changes:
A couple of new traps
A few modified traps
A couple of traps now have some more clarity in how they work
New button system, easy to see when things are able to be repressed

Finishing areas:
2 new areas
Button activated secret areas to prevent rank-whores from killing t's easily
New weapon equip system

Retaining from original:
AFK killing system
T's are faster than CT's
<hr>

PS:
"ennui" is said "on-wee", at least that was how i was taught it.
